channel.title: Glitchy Tower
channel.description: not sure what the level is called, and i didn't get a change to find my position, but its just before the section with all the trip bombs that cant be set off or the building explodes. the radar dish tower highlighted in fuchsia can be walked through. also during loading of a few levels (not sure specifically) the game crashes, but is fine once i relaunch it. also i often get "graphic node out of date, rebuilding" after a level loads. is there an easier way to submit bugs? was a bit of a pain on the arse to sign up and activate just to post this. [img]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Attachment/4481-2016-01-27-00002-jpg/[/img] ![2016-01-27_00002.jpg|690x500](upload://yzpFc6jBXDjXAKCpwW2vPObYWms.jpeg)

item.title: Glitchy Tower
item.dc:creator: Moist_Coitus
item.description:
not sure what the level is called, and i didn’t get a change to find my position, but its just before the section with all the trip bombs that cant be set off or the building explodes.
the radar dish tower highlighted in fuchsia can be walked through. also during loading of a few levels (not sure specifically) the game crashes, but is fine once i relaunch it. also i often get “graphic node out of date, rebuilding” after a level loads.
is there an easier way to submit bugs? was a bit of a pain on the arse to sign up and activate just to post this.

2016-01-27_00002.jpg4320×900 915 KB
